contextId.information: The words "labor" and "toil" mean basically the same thing. Paul uses them to emphasize how hard they worked. AT: "how hard we worked" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]])
Paul uses "encourage" and "exhort" to emphasize how strongly they encourage the believers. AT: "we strongly encourage you" (See:  [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]])
